definition: zero/nought/zero sign/fractional/fragmentary/odd (of numbers)/(placed between two numbers to indicate a smaller quantity followed by a larger one)/fraction/(in mathematics) remainder (after division)/extra/to wither and fall/to wither
fourth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/fourth in order/letter "D" or Roman "IV" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 195°/butyl/cubes (of food)
variant of 孤苦伶仃[gu1 ku3 ling2 ding1]

sentences.english: Be able to be alone. Lose not the advantage of solitude.
sentences.chinese: 要有零丁自处的能力，不要放过孤寂的好处。

sentences.english: Individual gutter sections can be connected or joined with snap-in-place connectors.
sentences.chinese: 水沟局部能够零丁或与衔接单位当场衔接器参加。

sentences.english: Imagine that you are alone on a tiny island.
sentences.chinese: 假设你零丁呆在一个小岛上。

sentences.english: I was destitute and alone: and these, where were they?
sentences.chinese: 我本是孤苦零丁的，他们却是从那里来的？

sentences.english: The "loneliness of the distance learner" is a thing of the past.
sentences.chinese: “长途教育是零丁的”概念仍旧成为曩昔。

sentences.english: Iim on itis own in this world.
sentences.chinese: 在这个世界上我总是零丁的。

sentences.english: The values have to be set in each subclass independently .
sentences.chinese: 每个子类的值必须零丁设置。

sentences.english: The F. P. A. doesn't cover partial loss of the nature of particular average.
sentences.chinese: 平安险不包括零丁海损性质的部分丧失落。

definition: variant of 飄零|飘零[piao1 ling2]
to be alone/to stand in isolation
alone and helpless/also written 零丁
to fall and wither (like autumn leaves)/(fig.) drifting and homeless
numerous and close together/(of hair) luxuriant/(of woods) dense/(of gunfire) intense
to wither (and drop off)/to wilt/to pass away
